main.subtitle: We design and develop high-performance, tailor-made digital solutions to drive your business forward.

quality.title: Premium quality
quality.description: Pixel-perfect interfaces built to the highest standards.

documented.title: Well documented
documented.description: Clear documentation so your team can maintain and extend with ease.

seo.title: SEO optimized
seo.description: Search-engine friendly from day one to maximize your visibility.

support.title: Ongoing support
support.description: Dedicated assistance after launch to keep everything running smoothly.

fastDelivery.title: Fast delivery
fastDelivery.description: Efficient workflows that get your project live on schedule.

cleanCode.title: Clean code
cleanCode.description: Readable, maintainable code that scales with your business.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We listen carefully to understand your needs, goals and vision.

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.description: We design a tailored solution and walk you through our approach.

quote.title: Quote
quote.description: You receive a detailed quote with clear pricing and milestones.

development.title: Development
development.description: We build your project, sharing progress and keeping you in the loop.

validation.title: Validation
validation.description: Together we review and validate the solution to ensure it meets your expectations.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: We deploy, hand over everything and make sure you're up and running.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Ongoing support and maintenance to keep your product at its best.

kickoff.title: Kick-off
kickoff.description: A percentage upfront payment gets us started right away.

milestone.title: Milestone payment
milestone.description: A progress payment at this stage keeps the project moving forward.

finalPayment.title: Final payment
finalPayment.description: The remaining balance is settled upon delivery.

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce website
ecommerce.description: A fully-featured online store tailored to your brand and products.

landing.title: Landing page
landing.description: A high-converting single-page site to showcase your product or service.

audit.title: Code audit
audit.description: A thorough review of your codebase with actionable recommendations.

mobile.title: Mobile app
mobile.description: A native or cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android.

coaching.title: Dev coaching
coaching.description: One-on-one sessions to level up your team's skills and practices.

custom.title: Custom app
custom.description: A bespoke web application built to your exact specifications.

team.title: Join your team
team.description: An experienced developer embedded in your team on a daily basis.

embedded.title: Embedded app
embedded.description: A purpose-built application for kiosks, terminals or dedicated hardware.

contact.heading: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about it.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.intellectualPropertyText: All content on this website (text, images, graphics, logos, icons) is the property of MedNach and is protected by French and international intellectual property laws. Any reproduction, distribution, or use without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited.
legal.liabilityText: MedNach makes every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information published on this site. However, MedNach cannot be held liable for errors, omissions, or results obtained from the use of this information.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: MedNach is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect personal data only when you voluntarily submit it through our contact form (name, email address, message content). We do not collect any data automatically outside of standard server logs.
privacy.dataUseText: The data collected is used solely to respond to your inquiries and to manage our business relationship. We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties.
privacy.cookiesText: This website does not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics. Only essential cookies required for the website to function properly may be used.
privacy.rightsText: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your personal data. You may also object to or restrict the processing of your data.
privacy.rightsExercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:
privacy.retentionText: Your personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
privacy.contactText: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at:
